name: Albany Latin Festival
description: Celebrate Latin culture with live music, dance performances, and authentic food vendors featuring tacos and more from the region.

name: Taco Tuesday at Villa Di Valletta
venue: Villa Di Valletta, 6 Marion Ave, Albany, NY
description: Savor authentic tacos with unique fusion flavors at this beloved local Italian-Mexican fusion restaurant during their weekly Taco Tuesday event.

name: Food Truck Festival at Crossgates
venue: Crossgates Mall, 1 Crossgates Mall Rd, Albany, NY
description: Sample diverse cuisines from local food trucks, including standout taco vendors and unique fusion dishes, at this family-friendly event.

name: Dia de los Muertos Celebration
venue: Albany Institute of History & Art, 125 Washington Ave, Albany, NY
description: Honor the Day of the Dead with traditional altars, music, and food, celebrating Mexican heritage with the community.

name: Dinner at Toro Cantina
venue: Toro Cantina, 111 Wolf Rd, Albany, NY
description: Experience modern Mexican cuisine with a focus on creative tacos and margaritas at this highly-rated local restaurant.

name: Rockin' on the River Concert Series
description: Enjoy free live music by regional bands along the Hudson River. Bring a lawn chair and soak in the vibes of summer evenings.

name: Albany Latin Fest
description: Celebrate Latin culture with live music, dance performances, authentic food vendors, and family-friendly activities in the heart of Albany.

name: Live at Empire Live: Indie Rock Night
description: Catch up-and-coming indie rock bands in an intimate venue. A hotspot for music lovers in the Capital Region.

name: Albany Pine Bush Discovery Day
venue: Albany Pine Bush Preserve, Albany, NY
description: A family-friendly event with guided hikes, nature crafts, and educational talks about the unique Pine Bush ecosystem.

name: Art on Lark
description: An annual street festival showcasing local artists, live music, and food vendors. A celebration of creativity in Albany's historic Lark Street neighborhood.

name: Albany Jazz Festival
description: A day of smooth jazz performances by local and national artists at the scenic riverfront. Free admission and open to all ages.

name: Harvest Fest at Empire State Plaza
description: Celebrate the fall season with pumpkin carving, hayrides, local food vendors, and live music. A perfect outing for families.

name: Saratoga Jazz Festival
description: Annual jazz festival featuring renowned artists and bands from around the world, set in the beautiful outdoor amphitheater of SPAC.

name: Saratoga Food and Wine Festival
description: A celebration of culinary excellence with tastings, chef demonstrations, and wine pairings from local and regional vendors.

name: Farmers Market Tasting Day
description: Sample fresh, local produce, artisanal cheeses, and homemade baked goods while supporting regional farmers and vendors.

name: Live Music at Caffe Lena
description: Intimate live music performance at America's oldest continuously operating folk music venue, featuring local and touring artists.

name: Taco Tuesday at Cantina
description: Weekly Taco Tuesday event featuring authentic Mexican tacos with a variety of fillings and house-made salsas.

name: Live Music at Rivers Casino
description: Enjoy an evening of live music at Rivers Casino with local bands and artists performing a mix of genres. Check the event calendar for the specific lineup.

name: Art Exhibition Opening: Local Perspectives
venue: Schenectady County Historical Society, Schenectady, NY
description: A new exhibition showcasing works by local artists, highlighting the culture and history of the Capital Region through diverse mediums.

name: Schenectady Jazz Festival
description: A celebration of jazz music with performances by local and regional artists across various downtown venues. Free and ticketed events available.

name: Taco Tuesday Pop-Up
description: A special pop-up event featuring unique taco creations with a fusion of Italian and Mexican flavors, hosted by a beloved local bakery.
